data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Aqmola to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Aqmola, Kazakhstan
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, make the 4,897 believers in Aqmola to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 830,303 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 170 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Aqmola who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 4,897 believers in Aqmola, Kazakhstan a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Kalmyk-Oirat people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Kalmyk-Oirat people.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Aqmola
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Aqmola.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Aqmola, Kazakhstan has a population of 835,200.

We estimate Aqmola has 4,897 people who might know Jesus, 109,177 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 721,126 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 170 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of Aqmola a passion to plant another simple church.
